meanings.definition: A type of mushroom, similar to a button mushroom but darker in color and with a richer flavor.
meanings.sent1: I added cremini mushrooms to the pasta sauce for extra flavor.
meanings.sent2: The salad was delicious with fresh cremini mushrooms on top.
meanings.sent3: The cremini mushrooms danced happily in the sizzling pan.
meanings.sent4: The cremini mushrooms were like little flavor bombs in the dish.
meanings.sent5: The earthy aroma of cremini mushrooms filled the kitchen.
